items.name: Ancient Sword
items.description: A rusted sword with mysterious engravings.

interactions.result: You pick up the ancient sword, feeling its weight in your hand.
The sword is old and worn, but the engravings seem to glow faintly.

items.name: Magic Lantern
items.description: A lantern that emits an eerie blue light.

interactions.result: You pick up the magic lantern, and it illuminates the surroundings.
You use the lantern, revealing hidden paths in the forest.
